title: My lollipoppy Skin gone missing
body:
Dear Riot,

I used my lolli poppy skin until 2 months ago, and i stopped playing poppy.

And then I started playing poppy these days again, and I have blacksmith poppy instead of lollipoppy.

Can you please check what happened? I HAD LOLLIPOPPY skin instead of blacksmith poppy. Please solve this issue.

Sincerely yours,

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find Lollopoppy on your account. I definitely second *Hyperion3182's* suggestion to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our account specialists can look into this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
see i had lollipoppy as well got it from a mystery gift when she was updated it vanished from my account. asked the support people and they said it wasn't their.

Hello,
Best thing to do is to contact Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
They will be able to tell you exactly what you bought or not.
